newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Trading of Chung Hwa shares suspended.
newsitem.headline: Trading of Chung Hwa shares suspended.

text.p: Trading in shares of packager Chung Hwa Development Holdings Ltd was suspended on Monday at the direction of the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong pending an announcement, the Exchange said.
The shares closed at HK$1.39 on Friday.

Chung Hwa said last week it had proposed spinning off its wholly-owned Leading Edge Packaging Inc on the Nasdaq National Market in the United States, but the terms of the public offer had not yet been finalised.
The company has filed a registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for a public offering of 1.25 million shares in its Leading Edge subsidiary.
